title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Designated Areas
body: Designated Wilderness Areas        A Cholla in the Nellis Wash Wilderness    Â    Lake Mead National Recreation Area (NRA) provides spectacular scenic vistas of Lake Mead and rugged and isolated backcountry. Striking and dramatic physical features include deep canyons, dry washes, sheer cliffs, distant mountain ranges, the lakes, colorful soils and rock formations and mosaics of different vegetation.
